summary.description:
Today, a bit warmer for the feels like temperature (up 2.4°C) and outside temperature (up 1.8°C).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 103 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in the amount of wind (up 20 miles), dew point temperature (up 3.4°C), feels like temperature (up 1.7°C), and outside temperature (up 2.8°C) when compared to today.

summary.summary: Inside; temperatures should be quite comfortable. Outside; the temperature will feel nicely warm and pleasant. Also, air will feel comfortable and balanced and winds should remain light. Chance of light rain, clouds will occasionally block sunlight, and periods of sunshine are expected. No significant shifts in the weather are expected.
